hero_title: Global Leader in Advanced 3rd Party Logistics
hero_subtitle: We deliver customized 3rd Party Logistics solutions, optimizing your supply chain with our top-tier expertise.
about_ideology_desc: KMTech proactively creates an environment to meet the demands and expectations of all stakeholders, taking responsibility to the very end.
tpl_biz_desc: KMTech takes full responsibility for our clients' logistics processes through our 3rd Party Logistics services. We provide one-stop solutions from storage, packaging, and inspection to delivery, utilizing state-of-the-art facilities and systematic processes, allowing our clients to focus on their core business.
tpl_warehouse_items: 3,000 pallets capacity → Reduce your inventory burden
2x 40ft container docks → Minimize unloading wait time
16-channel CCTV recording → Your assets are protected
tpl_inspection_items: 3,000 Class Clean Booth → Safe for electronics
Precision inspection & repair → Catch defects before shipment
Visual & Function Test equipment → Meet your quality standards
tpl_packaging_items: Custom repackaging → Ship-ready for your customers
50 pallets at once → Fast turnaround on bulk orders
ERP-linked QR system → Real-time inventory tracking
Sorting & classification → Tailored to your requirements
process_step_1_desc: Secure storage of products upon arrival at Jiksan Warehouse.
process_step_2_desc: Efficient unloading and preparation via dedicated container docks.
process_step_3_desc: Systematic sorting and storage of classified products.
process_step_4_desc: Careful dismantling of packaging for inspection and rework.
process_step_5_desc: Visual and functional testing to ensure quality standards.
process_step_6_desc: ERP-linked QR code scanning for accurate inventory management.
process_step_7_desc: Custom repackaging tailored to end-customer requirements.
process_step_8_desc: Loading onto trucks for final delivery to the end-customer.
contact_warehouse_address: 112-19, Gunsu 1-gil, Jiksan-eup, Seobuk-gu, Cheonan-si, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea
contact_form_desc: Have a question or want to work with us? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact_form_success_desc: Thank you for your inquiry. We will get back to you soon.
home_services_3pl_desc: We provide comprehensive 3rd party logistics services, including warehousing, inspection, and packaging, to optimize your supply chain.
home_service_warehouse_desc: Store your inventory safely in our 3,000-pallet facility. With real-time tracking and 16-channel CCTV monitoring, you can focus on your core business without worrying about asset security.
home_service_inspection_desc: Our engineers inspect every item in a 3,000 Class Clean Booth. We catch defects before they reach your customers—reducing claims and recall risks.
home_service_packaging_desc: We repack and label to your specs, then ship directly to your destination. Simplify your supply chain with ERP-integrated real-time tracking.
strong_point_1_desc: Extensive experience with automotive tier 1 companies, with a deep understanding of their requirements and systems.
strong_point_2_desc: In-depth knowledge of both logistics and quality inspection processes.
strong_point_3_desc: A flexible, individual, and personal approach to meet each customer's unique needs.
strong_point_4_desc: Our team is composed of highly qualified and experienced professionals.
strong_point_5_desc: We perform inspection and sorting activities in conjunction with our logistics services for maximum efficiency.
strong_point_6_desc: Equipped with a state-of-the-art clean booth for high-precision inspections.
about_org_desc: Our organization is structured to provide specialized and efficient services across all business areas. Each division is led by experienced professionals dedicated to achieving customer satisfaction.
footer_description: KMTech is a leading 3PL logistics company specializing in automotive and industrial sectors. We optimize your supply chain with state-of-the-art facilities and expert professionals.
contact_form_error_desc: There was an error sending your message. Please try again later.
validation_name_required: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation_message_required: Message must be at least 10 characters
partners_hero_desc: We partner with leading companies in the global automotive and electronics industries. Through long-term partnerships built on trust, we deliver the best logistics services.
partners_section_desc: Global companies in automotive, electronics, display, and various other industries trust KMTech's professional logistics services.
partners_cta_desc: Experience efficient logistics solutions with KMTech. We provide customized services tailored to your company's needs.
